PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: 84/26692--- Address: 65 - 67 And R/O 53 - 67 Sandy Lane SouthWallingtonSM6--- Proposal: Residential development at 33 HRPA comprising eighteen 4 bed detached houses, four 4 bed link detached houses, two 1 bed and two 2 bed and two 3 bed semi detached houses. One 2 bed detached bungalow and four 1 bed starter homesd together with garages, parking spaces, new access road and access onto Sandy Lane and Court close. Includes 1 - 34 Oaklands Way. 113-2-10--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 06-SEP-84---
